short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generator of fiscal information like iban and nif

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generator of portuguese fiscal information that can be use in inputs. This information its generated so its not representative of real values that are associated with real persona. This is mostly used for testing or dummy data for forms where there are requirements for these to be accepted.
